titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31994D0672 English

94/672/CFSP: Council Decision of 10 October 1994 on the Common Position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union and concerning the reduction of economic and financial relations with those parts of the territory of the Republic of Bosnia- Herzegovina under the control of the Bosnian Serb forces

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 94/672/CFSP: Council Decision of 10 October 1994 on the Common Position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union and concerning the reduction of economic and financial relations with those parts of the territory of the Republic of Bosnia- Herzegovina under the control of the Bosnian Serb forces
body.p: COUNCIL DECISION of 10 October 1994 on the common position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union and concerning the reduction of economic and financial relations with those parts of the territory of the Republic of Bosnia-Herzegovina under the control of the Bosnian Serb forces (94/672/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article J.2 thereof,
Having regard to Resolution 942 (1994) adopted by the United Nations Security Council on 23 September 1994,

Economic and financial relations with those parts of the territory of the Republic of Bosnia-Herzegovina under the control of the Bosnian Serb forces will be reduced in accordance with the relevant provisions of Resolution 942 (1994) adopted by the United Nations Security Council on 23 September 1994.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
